thread.title: CPO of TUNE Saira Nayak to Speak at Privacy + Security Forum
thread.title_full: CPO of TUNE Saira Nayak to Speak at Privacy + Security Forum

author: Jennifer Wong
title: CPO of TUNE Saira Nayak to Speak at Privacy + Security Forum
text:
TUNE, the leading enterprise platform for marketers and their partners to measure results on mobile, today announced its Chief Privacy Officer Saira Nayak will speak about implementing effective governance for big data at the Privacy + Security Forum in Washington, D.C. The Privacy + Security Forum brings together experts from the fields of privacy, security, public policy, academia, and technology to create an effective conversation on breaking down the silos separating privacy and security. Nayak is the first-ever Chief Privacy Officer in the mobile attribution analytics industry and brings 15 years of legal experience in privacy and data security, antitrust, and intellectual property to the conversation. At TUNE, Nayak works to ensure internal compliance and leads outreach to regulators and other stakeholders on privacy and data security matters.
Nayak’s session will explore laws and best practices regarding usage and protection of personal data, how global organizations adhere to compliance obligations, and categorizing data throughout its lifecycle. The discussion will dive into these topics and illustrate how businesses can implement an effective data governance plan and face the unique challenges associated with big data and privacy.
What:
Panel on Defining “Reasonable Data Security” and “Personal Data” Across Borders
Who:
Saira Nayak, CPO, TUNE
Jim Adler, VP of Products and Marketing, CPO, Metanautix
When:
Oct. 22, 2015 from 3:30-5:00 pm EDT
Where:
The Marvin Center
800 21st Street Northwest
Washington, D.C. 20052
Additional Resources:
Learn more about TUNE: http://www.tune.com/
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/tune
Follow us on LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/tune
About TUNE:
TUNE ( http://www.tune.com/ ) is the leading enterprise SaaS for marketers and their partners to measure results on mobile. Driven by industry-standard products like the TUNE® Marketing Console and HasOffers, TUNE's products have become the most used measurement technology by the 100 top-grossing apps across all platforms. Headquartered in Seattle, Washington with more than 300 employees in eight offices worldwide, TUNE is the most widely adopted solution to measure mobile marketing performance and is trusted by brands such as Expedia, Sephora, Trulia, Alaska Airlines, EA, DraftKings, and more.
